name: ncmec
short: Interact with the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children
description: This cog allows you to fetch information about recently missing children from the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children (NCMEC).
install_msg: Thank you for installing the NCMEC cog. Use `[p]ncmec recent` to get information about recently missing children.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores and shares no user data, unless coincidentally that user is also a missing person, in which case - you good?
author: adminelevation
